Replace.Text: A district that provides this city with a source of fresh water from an adjacent River, Lake, Oasis, or Mountain. Cities that do not yet have existing fresh water receive up to 6 [ICON_Housing] Housing. Cities that already have existing fresh water will instead get +2 [ICON_Housing] Housing. If built adjacent to a Geothermal Fissure +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity. Prevents [ICON_Food] Food loss during Drought. Must be built adjacent to the City Center.

A district that provides this city with a source of fresh water from an adjacent River, Lake, Oasis, or Mountain. Cities that do not yet have existing fresh water receive up to 6 [ICON_Housing] Housing. Cities that already have existing fresh water will instead get +2 [ICON_Housing] Housing. If built adjacent to a Geothermal Fissure +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity. Prevents [ICON_Food] Food loss during Drought. Must be built adjacent to the City Center. Military Engineers can spend a charge to complete 20% of an Aqueduct's production.
Canal

A district built on flat land to connect two bodies of water or a body of water to a City Center. [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes traveling through it can multiply the [ICON_Gold] Gold they get from districts at their destination. Canals may either go straight through the hex or bend by 60 degrees. However three-way Canal junctures are not allowed and Canals must have a full land tile on each side of the waterway they create. Military Engineers can spend a charge to complete 20% of a Canal's production.
Dam

A district built on a Floodplains tile to improve the comfort of living along this river. Prevents damage from flooding of this river (though yields from flooding drop by 50%). Prevents [ICON_Food] Food loss during Drought. Only one may be built along each river's floodplain (whichever player completes one first) and the river must traverse at least two sides of the Dam hex. Military Engineers can spend a charge to complete 20% of a Dam's production.

A district that is required to construct the Science Victory projects. This includes {LOC_PROJECT_LAUNCH_EARTH_SATELLITE_NAME}, {LOC_PROJECT_LAUNCH_MOON_LANDING_NAME}, {LOC_PROJECT_LAUNCH_MARS_BASE_NAME}, and {LOC_PROJECT_LAUNCH_EXOPLANET_EXPEDITION_NAME}. Cannot be built on Hills.
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith from the adjacent Desert Hills {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_FOOD] Food from the adjacent Desert {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_FOOD] Food from the adjacent Desert Hills {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold from the adjacent Mountain {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from the adjacent Mountain {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from the adjacent Mountain {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from each adjacent Geothermal Fissure.
+{1_num} [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from each adjacent Reef.
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Gold from the adjacent Cothon district.
Adjacency: Major [ICON_Gold] Gold bonus for each adjacent City Center. Standard [ICON_Gold] Gold bonus for each adjacent coastal resource. Minor [ICON_Gold] Gold bonus for adjacent district tiles.
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Gold from the adjacent Holy Site district.
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Gold from the adjacent Lavra district.
Adjacency: Major [ICON_Gold] Gold bonus for each adjacent Holy Site. Major [ICON_Gold] Gold bonus from a tile containing a River edge. Minor [ICON_Gold] Gold bonus for adjacent district tiles.
+{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production from the adjacent Mines.
+{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production from the adjacent Lumber Mills.
+{1_num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from the adjacent Aqueduct {1_Num : plural 2?district; other?districts;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from the adjacent Bath {1_Num : plural 2?district; other?districts;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from the adjacent Canal {1_Num : plural 2?district; other?districts;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from the adjacent Dam {1_Num : plural 2?district; other?districts;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from the adjacent Strategic {1_Num : plural 1?resource; other?resources;}.

Adjacency: Major [ICON_Production] Production bonus if adjacent to a Commercial Hub, Aqueduct, Canal, and Dam districts. Standard [ICON_Production] Production bonus for each adjacent resource. Minor [ICON_Production] Production bonus for adjacent district tiles.
Move Capital
Move Capital
Phoenician unique project available to any city with a Cothon. When complete, the Phoenician [ICON_Capital] Capital moves to this city.
Carbon Recapture
Carbon Recapture

Can be run in any city with an Industrial Zone. When complete, the lifetime carbon emissions of this civilization are reduced by 50 and 30 [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Favor are earned. This project can even reduce your carbon debt to zero and allow you to accumulate reductions against the global CO2 footprint.
Convert to Coal Power
Convert to Coal Power

Decommissions the current Power Plant in this city, and replaces it with the {LOC_BUILDING_COAL_POWER_PLANT_NAME}.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_COAL_POWER_PLANT_NAME}:[NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_COAL_POWER_PLANT_DESCRIPTION}
Convert to Oil Power
Convert to Oil Power

Decommissions the current Power Plant in this city, and replaces it with the {LOC_BUILDING_FOSSIL_FUEL_POWER_PLANT_NAME}.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_FOSSIL_FUEL_POWER_PLANT_NAME}:[NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_FOSSIL_FUEL_POWER_PLANT_DESCRIPTION}
Convert to Nuclear Power
Convert to Nuclear Power

Decommissions the current Power Plant in this city, and replaces it with the {LOC_BUILDING_POWER_PLANT_EXPANSION2_NAME}.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_POWER_PLANT_EXPANSION2_NAME}:[NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_POWER_PLANT_EXPANSION2_DESCRIPTION}
Launch Mars Colony
Launch Mars Colony
Space Race project which establishes a small human base on the surface of Mars. Marks the third step towards the Science Victory.
You successfully establish a colony on Mars! Marks the third step towards the Science Victory.
Launch Exoplanet Expedition
Exoplanet Expedition
Space Race project which travels through deep space at 1 Light Year per turn to spread humankind to another star system. Wins the Science Victory once it arrives. Can be sped up by other projects.
Your seed ship is on its way to another star system! Wins the Science Victory once it arrives. Travels 1 Light Year per turn, and can be sped up by other projects.
Launch Lagrange Laser Station
Lagrange Laser Station

Requires 30 [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] Aluminum to begin construction. Space Race project which speeds up your Exoplanet Expedition by +1 Light Year per turn, accelerating your progress towards a Science Victory.
You establish a Lagrange Laser Station in orbit, speeding up your Exoplanet Expedition ship by 1 Light Year per turn and bringing you closer to a Science Victory!
Build Terrestrial Laser Station
Terrestrial Laser Station

Once completed, this city's [ICON_Power] Power requirements increase by 5. Space Race project which speeds up your Exoplanet Expedition by +1 Light Year per turn as long as the city is [ICON_Power] Powered, accelerating your progress towards a Science Victory.
You establish a Terrestrial Laser Station in the Spaceport, speeding up your Exoplanet Expedition ship by 1 Light Year per turn and bringing you closer to a Science Victory!
Send Aid
Send Aid
Project to earn score for your Aid Request competitions.
Your aid package has been delivered, increasing your score in the Aid Request competition.
Train Athletes
Train Athletes
Project to earn score for the World Games competition.
Your athletes are now ready for the games, increasing your score in the World Game competition.
Train Astronauts
Train Astronauts
Project to earn score for the International Space Station competition.
Your astronauts are ready to work in the International Space Station, increasing your score in the International Space Station competition.
District-based project which provides [ICON_Faith] Faith and +100% Religious Pressure every turn. Awards [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points once finished.
District-based project which provides this city with full [ICON_Power] Power while active. It also provides [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer points once finished.
Recommission Nuclear Reactor
Recommission Nuclear Reactor

Allows for the recommissioning of a nuclear reactor to increase safety measures and reduce the risk of a nuclear accident.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Recommissioning resets the reactor age to 0. The older a reactor gets, the higher the chance that a Nuclear Accident can occur.
Decommission Coal Power Plant
Decommission Coal Power Plant
Project to earn score for the Climate Accords competition. Removes the Coal Power Plant and all its effects from this city.
Decommission Oil Power Plant
Decommission Oil Power Plant
Project to earn score for the Climate Accords competition. Removes the Oil Power Plant and all its effects from this city.
Decommission Nuclear Power Plant
Decommission Nuclear Power Plant
Project to earn score for the Climate Accords competition. Removes the Nuclear Power Plant and all its effects from this city.
